attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
make cannabis legal for people with severe illnesses like ms for instance.
it helps us tremendously but we are just sick of the stigma attached to it.

some are offered sativex the cannabis spray but unfortunately some cant take it because of the taste. it is vile.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
